By [Danielle Navarro](https://learningstatisticswithr.com/)

The wonderful Danielle Navarro taught an introductory statistics class for psychology students. Her lecture notes for this class became a great book that is freely available.

1.  The book is here: <https://learningstatisticswithr.com/book/>
2.  The repository with all the source materials is here: <https://github.com/djnavarro/rbook>
